website_summaries.verdict: Fashion and comfort collide with the Performance Expert sneaker from Hush Puppies. Crafted with a sleek and soft upper and a cushioned footbed, it has the comfort of a sneaker combined with a dressier edge.However, people with wide feet need to take note that they may have to order a ½ size larger than usual and in a wide width to achieve a comfier fit since it was reported as tight in fit. Overall, it is a great and comfortable shoe recommended by most reviewers.
pros: The Hush Puppies Performance Expert offers excellent comfort perfect for walking, according to a significant number of reviewers
Many customers have expressed their admiration for the sneaker’s fashionable design
It offers arch support even for people with flat feet, according to some users
Several purchasers have said that the men’s Performance Expert is a perfect match for both casual and non-casual outfits
It is a very lightweight sneaker, as many wearers have noted
A few testers have attested that this kind of Hush Puppies sneakers has a soft and breathable upper
A couple of patrons have shared that it offers stability like a tennis shoe
According to some men, they receive compliments whenever they wear the low-top Performance Expert
cons: Several people with wide feet have muttered that the Hush Puppies Performance runs a bit tight even if they ordered the wide width

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, for a guy I have a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, for a guy I have a lot of shoes/boots...this pair is my favorite. Extremely comfortable, and lightweight. The seller wrote me a hand written note on the receipt thanking me for my order!

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in blue and they look so good! I have very flat feet and wear orthotics in most shoes. Have been wearing these for a week and don't need my orthotics. The removable insole is very comfortable on my feet with good arch support. The sock liner is a great idea to avoid having the shoe rub up against your heel and ankles. They are also light as a feather. Will definitely be purchasing more hush puppies shoes

product_meta.title: Hush Puppies Performance Expert Mens Lace Up Shoes Taupe
product_meta.description: A sport-influenced everyday casual that easily takes you to the office, around town and out at night. True all-day comfort, flexible, lightweight, and made to move!
feature_bullets: Soft burnished, tumbled full grain leather or soft nubuck uppers.
Dri-lex soft mesh lining and socklining for climate control.
Contour cushion footbed combines layers of memory foam and breathable PU foam, with a molded EVA heel and anatomical arch support. Lightweight and flexible multidensity molded EVA outsole.
Biobevel: Beveled toe and heel encourage a balanced, natural walking motion to enjoy all day activity with ease.
Bio Trax: A deep "S" groove guides the foot forward while internal stabilizing zones support the foot encouraging natural movement.
